title: sadAshrayE abhayAmbikE
sahitya:
anupallavi

A: cidAshrayE cidambara candrikE Ehi cidAshrayE shiva mancakE nava vArAhi mudAshrayE 
bhukti mukti prada mArgam brUhi mudAshrayE mAyAdhInam dInam mAm pAhi


caraNam   gauri mAyUranAtha mOhanakara shaktE shaurIsha vidhIndrAdi sannuta parAshaktE 
nArImaNyAdyarccita nAda bindu yuktE shArIrakAdi vidyA siddhAnta yuktE bhErI maddaLa
vINA vAdanAnuraktE sUrIjanOpAsita caraNa naLina yuktE vANImA karadhrta cAmara 
sEvAsaktE dUrIkrta durita vEda shAstrAdi prasaktE vArIshAdi lOka pAlanuta guruguha 
bhaktE dAridrya duhkha bhanjanakara shankarAvibhaktE shuka sanakAdi dEvatA sEvitE 
paradEvatE vAri jamukhi varadAbhaya hastE namO namastE
